global.congrats: Congratulations, your file has been successfully uploaded on data.gouv.fr!
global.access_forbidden: You have not authorized publier.etalab.studio to access your data.gouv.fr account.
global.publier_needs2: access to your profile and organizations on data.gouv.fr
global.publier_needs3: to publish data under your name on data.gouv.fr
global.please_click: Please click on the button below and accept these conditions if you wish to publish your data on data.gouv.fr.
global.not_datagouv: I do not wish to publish my data on data.gouv.fr.

footer.contribute: The code is open source and contributions are most welcome.

home.catchline: Enter, validate and publish your structured data
home.description: You are using a schema as a reference? Validate and amend your files, and publish them directly on

selected.title: Enter or load data
selected.subtitle: Is your data already structured?
selected.already_yes: If you already have a file, answer yes.
selected.already_no: If you are starting from scratch, answer no.
selected.tool_description: Our tool helps you build your file!
selected.proceed_question: How would you like to proceed?
selected.unsupported_schema: This tool doesn't handle this type of data
selected.publish_directly: You may publish your data directly on
selected.already_file: If you already have a file, you can upload your data (by clicking 'yes' above).
selected.other_schema: This schema is ruled by an independant standard, our tool isn't compatible for now.
selected.explore_files: Explore the related files on data.gouv.fr

form.title: Form
form.subtitle: Enter your data through a form
form.description: This tool helps you create a CSV file and make sure it is consistent with a schema (i.e. that its content is complete, valid, and structured):
form.guideline1: Fill in the form with the help field descriptions and the examples. Fields that have a red asterisk are mandatory,
form.guideline2: The tool warns you if any validation error is detected, and allows you to amend it if so,
form.guideline3: Once the form is properly filled, the values will appear in a single row in a summary table,
form.guideline4: You can then choose to add one or more rows (repeat steps 1 to 4),
form.guideline5: Finally, you can download the CSV file or upload it directly on data.gouv.fr.

upload.title: Uploading data
upload.check_existing: Check and upload an existing file
upload.too_many_rows: This tool cannot handle files with that many rows.
upload.if_issues: If you experience persistent issues, you may contact the producer of the schema
upload.publish_anyway1: Despite these errors, you may publish your file as-is (however it will not be connected to the schema)

error.file_perfect: Congrats! Your file is perfectly in compliance.
error.file_warning: Your file has passed the validation test despite not fulfilling all the specifications of the schema.
error.list_errors2: error(s). You can check the list of errors and amend the file.
error.see_documentation: We advise you to check the documentation and download the template file.
